practice_phrases: If only I could.
要是我能。
If only I could help.
要是我能帮助。
If only I could open the door.
要是我能开门。
If only I could try to help.
要是我能努力帮助。
If only I could get some sleep.
要是我能睡一觉。
If only I could close the window now.
要是我能现在关窗。
If only I could love the way you try to help.
要是我能喜欢你努力帮助的方式。
If only I could open the door and close the window next.
要是我能接下来开门关窗。
If only I could stand alone over there inside the entrance.
要是我能一个人站在那边入口里面。
If only I could want to sit between the two girls when it matters.
要是我能想在重要时候坐在两个女孩中间。
Trust you.
相信你们。
If only I could trust you.
要是我能相信你们。
I love to trust you.
我喜欢相信你们。
Maybe I should trust you.
也许我应该相信你们。
If only I could trust you to help.
要是我能相信你们帮助。
I should trust you to close the window.
我应该相信你们关窗。
If only I could trust you to open the door next.
要是我能相信你们接下来开门。
That sounds as though I should trust you to try when it matters.
听起来好像我应该相信你们在重要时候努力。
Maybe I should trust you to want to sit after the show.
也许我应该相信你们在演出之后想坐。
If only I could trust you to stand alone over there inside.
要是我能相信你们一个人站在那边里面。
